mapper.select: SELECT A.*, C.cd_nm as lang_name FROM ( SELECT condition_seq, question_seq, condition_type, condition_value, CASE WHEN USE_YN = '1' THEN true ELSE false end USE_YN FROM tb_question_condition WHERE question_seq = cast(#{question_seq} as integer) ) A LEFT JOIN TB_CODE_MASTER C ON C.CD_ID = A.condition_type
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_question_condition ( condition_seq, question_seq, condition_type, condition_value, use_yn ) VALUES ( nextval('sq_tb_question_condition'), cast(#{question_seq} as integer), #{condition_type}, #{condition_value}, CASE WHEN #{use_yn} = true THEN '1' ELSE '0' end )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_question_condition SET condition_type = #{condition_type}, condition_value= #{condition_value}, USE_YN = CASE WHEN #{use_yn} = true THEN '1' ELSE '0' end WHERE condition_seq = CAST(#{condition_seq} as integer)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_question_condition WHERE 1 = 1 AND question_seq = CAST(#{question_seq} as integer)
